diff_hunk:
@@ -1443,7 +1443,7 @@ def triplet_margin_loss(anchor, positive, negative, margin=1.0, p=2, eps=1e-6, s
     .. math::
         L(a, p, n) = \frac{1}{N} \left( \sum_{i=1}^N \max \{d(a_i, p_i) - d(a_i, n_i) + {\rm margin}, 0\} \right)
 
-    where :math:`d(x_i, y_i) = \| {\bf x}_i - {\bf y}_i \|_2^2`.
+    where :math:`d(x_i, y_i) = \| {\bf x}_i - {\bf y}_i \|_2`.
body:
Actually this is not true either. Can you please replace `_2` with `_p` (it's really a distance induced by a p-norm)?

Also, can you please replace `|` with `'\lVert` and `\rVert` to make it look more like a norm? Thank you!
body_html:

Also, can you please replace | with '\lVert and \rVert to make it look more like a norm? Thank you!
